title: It's all man-made
creator_credit: Robert Young, James Archibald, Department of Environment and Central Office of Information
brief_description: Traces the impact of man’s industrial pursuits on the environment, focusing on the United Kingdom, and how industrialisation can work side-by-side with improving the natural landscape. Commentary by Ian Morrison.
creator_credit_for_label: Robert Young, James Archibald, Department of Environment and Central Office of Information
